concise_definition: n. （专有名词）盖拉德（姓氏或人名）

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname or given name, most notably associated with Steven Gerrard, the former English professional footballer and current manager.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常用作姓氏或名字，最著名的是指前英格兰职业足球运动员、现任教练史蒂文·盖拉德。
definitions.example_en: Steven Gerrard captained Liverpool FC for over a decade and is considered one of the greatest midfielders in Premier League history.
definitions.example_cn: 史蒂文·盖拉德曾长期担任利物浦足球俱乐部队长，被认为是英超历史上最伟大的中场球员之一。
